rows.label: qst702501_msg0001
rows.name:
Kids, stay calm and just do what the
grown-ups tell you!

rows.label: qst702501_msg0005
rows.name:
There's a monster attack down at
the harbor! It's pandemonium!

rows.label: qst702501_msg0006
rows.name: I count just three of them.

rows.label: qst702501_msg0007
rows.name:
Why would so few of them chance
an attack on a settlement...?

rows.label: qst702501_msg0008
rows.name:
Maybe the rest of their pack's
somewhere else?

rows.label: qst702501_msg0009
rows.name:
We'd have a good chance at getting
some reinforcements through.

rows.label: qst702501_msg0010
rows.name:
How many able bodies have you got,
Noel?

rows.label: qst702501_msg0011
rows.name:
Most of them are already out on other
duties, I'm afraid.

rows.label: qst702501_msg0012
rows.name:
OK, then I want everyone available to
help with the evacuation.

rows.label: qst702501_msg0013
rows.name: Leave the monsters up to us.

rows.label: qst702501_msg0014
rows.name:
Ah... Maybe I should stay here at the
lookout.

rows.label: qst702501_msg0015
rows.name: I'll be more use here, I reckon.

rows.label: qst702501_msg0016
rows.name:
OK, you can sit tight here, then.
But promise me one thing...

rows.label: qst702501_msg0017
rows.name:
If it starts to look dicey, retreat.
That's an order!

rows.label: qst702501_msg0019
rows.name:
We're all clear then.
We'll see you later, Noel!
